### [408] [A Zone-Based Algorithm for Timed Parity Games](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07361)
*Gilles Geeraerts,Frédéric Herbreteau,Jean-François Raskin,Alexis Reynouard*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: 该论文对带时序的游戏进行了回顾，并引入了修改后的语义，以解决控制器合成中的直观性问题并开发高效的基于区域的算法。该算法成功解决了时序奇偶游戏，并已在 UppAal 中实现，证明了基于区域算法和丰富的时序交互语义的可行性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 该研究的主要动机是解决“惊喜元素时序游戏”中引入的语义在控制器合成的背景下可能出现的反直观情况，并开发高效的基于区域的算法。

Method: 本文提出了一种修改后的带时序的游戏语义，并开发了一种基于区域的算法来解决时序奇偶游戏。该算法已使用 UppAal 的区域库进行实现。

Result: 本文提出的算法成功解决了时序奇偶游戏，并且已通过 UppAal 的区域库实现，证明了基于区域的算法和丰富的时序交互语义是可行的。

Conclusion: 该研究成功地修改了带时序的游戏的语义，以解决控制器合成中的直观性问题，并开发了一种有效的基于区域的算法来处理时序奇偶游戏，证明了该方法在 UppAal 中的可行性。

Abstract: This paper revisits timed games by building upon the semantics introduced in
"The Element of Surprise in Timed Games". We introduce some modifications to
this semantics for two primary reasons: firstly, we recognize instances where
the original semantics appears counterintuitive in the context of controller
synthesis; secondly, we present methods to develop efficient zone-based
algorithms. Our algorithm successfully addresses timed parity games, and we
have implemented it using UppAal's zone library. This prototype effectively
demonstrates the feasibility of a zone-based algorithm for parity objectives
and a rich semantics for timed interactions between the players.

</details>


### [409] [Homomorphism Problems in Graph Databases and Automatic Structures](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07422)
*Rémi Morvan*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: 本论文研究了同态问题在数据库查询和约束满足两大领域中的应用，并提出相应的最小化算法和判定方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本论文旨在探索同态问题（保持结构的映射）在有限图状数据上的数据库查询以及在（潜在无限的）结构上的约束满足问题中的核心作用。

Method: 论文第一部分研究了在保持原子数量和查询图的树宽度两个度量下的“合取正则路径查询”的最小化问题，证明了该问题是可判定的，并为实际中常用的查询片段提供了有效算法。第二部分将同态问题扩展到由有限自动机描述的无限自动结构上，揭示了其可判定性（ndlogarithmic space）与不可判定性之间的二分法，并利用新的代数语言理论证明了描述自动结构所用逻辑的可判定性。

Result: 第一部分证明了在原子数量和树宽度两个度量下，合取正则路径查询的最小化问题是可判定的，并为常用查询片段提供了有效算法。第二部分揭示了自动结构上的同态问题存在可判定性与不可判定性之间的二分法，并证明了对于任何良态逻辑，自动结构是否能用该逻辑描述是可判定的。

Conclusion: 本论文在数据库查询和约束满足领域都对同态问题进行了深入研究，取得了关于查询最小化和自动结构逻辑描述可判定性的重要成果。

Abstract: This thesis investigates the central role of homomorphism problems
(structure-preserving maps) in two complementary domains: database querying
over finite, graph-shaped data, and constraint solving over (potentially
infinite) structures. Building on the well-known equivalence between
conjunctive query evaluation and homomorphism existence, the first part focuses
on conjunctive regular path queries, a standard extension of conjunctive
queries that incorporates regular-path predicates. We study the fundamental
problem of query minimization under two measures: the number of atoms
(constraints) and the tree-width of the query graph. In both cases, we prove
the problem to be decidable, and provide efficient algorithms for a large
fragment of queries used in practice. The second part of the thesis lifts
homomorphism problems to automatic structures, which are infinite structures
describable by finite automata. We highlight a dichotomy, between homomorphism
problems over automatic structures that are decidable in non-deterministic
logarithmic space, and those that are undecidable (proving to be the more
common case). In contrast to this prevalence of undecidability, we then focus
on the language-theoretic properties of these structures, and show, relying on
a novel algebraic language theory, that for any well-behaved logic (a
pseudovariety), whether an automatic structure can be described in this logic
is decidable.

</details>


### [410] [Verifying Graph Neural Networks with Readout is Intractable](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08045)
*Artem Chernobrovkin,Marco Sälzer,François Schwarzentruber,Nicolas Troquard*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: We propose a logical language to analyze quantized ACR-GNNs, proving their verification is (co)NEXPTIME-complete, indicating intractability. Experiments show quantized models are lightweight yet accurate.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The paper is motivated by the need to reason about and ensure the safety of quantized aggregate-combine graph neural networks with global readout (ACR-GNNs), whose computational intractability for verification tasks has been demonstrated.

Method: The authors introduce a logical language for reasoning about quantized ACR-GNNs. They use this language to establish a logical characterization and prove that verification tasks for these models are (co)NEXPTIME-complete.

Result: The paper's main result is the proof that verifying quantized ACR-GNNs is (co)NEXPTIME-complete. Additionally, experiments show that these quantized models are lightweight and maintain good accuracy and generalization compared to non-quantized models.

Conclusion: The verification of quantized ACR-GNNs is computationally intractable, necessitating research into GNN safety. However, quantized ACR-GNNs offer a practical solution by being lightweight while preserving performance.

Abstract: We introduce a logical language for reasoning about quantized
aggregate-combine graph neural networks with global readout (ACR-GNNs). We
provide a logical characterization and use it to prove that verification tasks
for quantized GNNs with readout are (co)NEXPTIME-complete. This result implies
that the verification of quantized GNNs is computationally intractable,
prompting substantial research efforts toward ensuring the safety of GNN-based
systems. We also experimentally demonstrate that quantized ACR-GNN models are
lightweight while maintaining good accuracy and generalization capabilities
with respect to non-quantized models.

</details>


### [411] [Implication Problems over Positive Semirings](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08112)
*Minna Hirvonen*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: We explore dependency notions in semiring team semantics, a framework unifying relational, bag, and probabilistic interpretations of data.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: To generalize and unify various dependency notions (functional, inclusion, marginal identity, independence) from database and probability theory within the semiring team semantics framework.

Method: We examine axiomatizations of implication problems, providing rule-based characterizations for inferring dependencies, and study these within the general framework of semiring teams.

Result: Semiring team semantics allows for the simultaneous study of different implication problems across various semirings, each offering a specific semantic interpretation.

Conclusion: The semiring team semantics framework provides a unified way to study different dependency types and their implications under various semantic interpretations (relational, bag, probabilistic).

Abstract: We study various notions of dependency in semiring team semantics. Semiring
teams are essentially database relations, where each tuple is annotated with
some element from a positive semiring. We consider semiring generalizations of
several dependency notions from database theory and probability theory,
including functional and inclusion dependencies, marginal identity, and
(probabilistic) independence. We examine axiomatizations of implication
problems, which are rule-based characterizations for the logical implication
and inference of new dependencies from a given set of dependencies. Semiring
team semantics provides a general framework, where different implication
problems can be studied simultaneously for various semirings. The choice of the
semiring leads to a specific semantic interpretation of the dependencies, and
hence different semirings offer a way to study different semantics (e.g.,
relational, bag, and probabilistic semantics) in a unified framework.

</details>


### [412] [Complexity Results in Team Semantics: Nonemptiness Is Not So Complex](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08122)
*Aleksi Anttila,Juha Kontinen,Fan Yang*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: 本論文研究了凸逻辑在团队语义下的复杂性理论性质，特别是加入了非空原子NE的经典命题逻辑的扩展。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究凸逻辑在团队语义下的复杂性理论性质，重点关注加入了非空原子NE的经典命题逻辑的扩展。

Method: 分析该逻辑的满足性问题（NP-complete）、有效性问题（coNP-complete）和模型检查问题（P）。

Result: 满足性问题是NP-complete，有效性问题是coNP-complete，模型检查问题在P类。

Conclusion: 该逻辑的复杂性理论性质已被确定，各项问题的计算复杂度已明确。

Abstract: We initiate the study of the complexity-theoretic properties of convex logics
in team semantics. We focus on the extension of classical propositional logic
with the nonemptiness atom NE, a logic known to be both convex and union
closed. We show that the satisfiability problem for this logic is NP-complete,
that its validity problem is coNP-complete, and that its model-checking problem
is in P.

</details>


### [413] [Compression for Coinductive Infinitary Rewriting: A Generic Approach, with Applications to Cut-Elimination for Non-Wellfounded Proofs](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08420)
*Rémy Cerda,Alexis Saurin*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: Infinitary rewriting systems can be compressed to sequences of length at most omega, and this paper provides a generic proof of compression for non-wellfounded derivations, using first-order rewriting, lambda-calculi, and a proof system called muMALL_infinity as examples.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The paper aims to extend the coinductive presentation of infinitary rewriting to non-wellfounded derivations and investigate the compression property in this new setting.

Method: The paper designs a generic proof of compression by factorizing most of the proof and identifying a key property that a compressible infinitary rewriting system should possess.

Result: A generic proof of compression is developed, which is then applied to first-order rewriting, infinitary lambda-calculi (justifying their coinductive presentation), and cut-elimination sequences in the proof system muMALL_infinity.

Conclusion: The paper successfully extends the concept of compression to non-wellfounded derivations in infinitary rewriting and provides a general method for proving this property, illustrated with relevant examples.

Abstract: Infinitary rewriting, i.e. rewriting featuring possibly infinite terms and
sequences of reduction, is a convenient framework for describing the dynamics
of non-terminating but productive rewriting systems. In its original definition
based on metric convergence of ordinal-indexed sequences of rewriting steps, a
highly desirable property of an infinitary rewriting system is Compression,
i.e. the fact that rewriting sequences of arbitrary ordinal length can always
be 'compressed' to equivalent sequences of length at most {\omega}.
  Since then, the standard examples of infinitary rewriting systems have been
given another equivalent presentation based on coinduction. In this work, we
extend this presentation to the rewriting of arbitrary non-wellfounded
derivations and we investigate compression in this setting. We design a generic
proof of compression, relying on a characterisation factorising most of the
proof and identifying the key property a compressible infinitary rewriting
system should enjoy.
  As running examples, we discuss first-order rewriting and infinitary
{\lambda}-calculi. For the latter, compression can in particular be seen as a
justification of its coinductive presentation in the literature. As a more
advanced example, we also address compression of cut-elimination sequences in
the non-wellfounded proof system {\mu}MALL{\infty} for multiplicative-additive
linear logics with fixed points, which is a key lemma of several
cut-elimination results for similar proof systems.

</details>


### [414] [Dynamic Automated Deduction by Contradiction Separation: The Standard Extension Algorithm](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08468)
*Yang Xu,Xingxing He,Shuwei Chen,Jun Liu,Xiaomei Zhong*

Main category: cs.LO

TL;DR: 该论文提出了标准扩展算法，这是第一个明确的程序化实现相冲突分离推理的方法，它通过互补文字扩展动态地构建冲突，从而在统一的算法中实现可满足性和不可满足性检查。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了解决经典基于归结的系统在推理过程中存在的限制，该论文引入了标准扩展算法，以实现更有效的多子句协同推理。

Method: 提出标准扩展算法，通过互补文字扩展动态构建冲突，并将矛盾分离扩展（CSE）理论操作化为统一的算法，用于可满足性和不可满足性检查。

Result: 该算法的正确性和完备性得到了正式证明，并且其有效性通过基于CSE的系统在近期主要自动化推理竞赛（CASC）中的表现得到了间接支持。

Conclusion: 标准扩展机制为动态、多子句的自动推理提供了稳健且经过实践验证的基础。

Abstract: Automated deduction seeks to enable machines to reason with mathematical
precision and logical completeness. Classical resolution-based systems, such as
Prover9, E, and Vampire, rely on binary inference, which inherently limits
multi-clause synergy during proof search. The Contradiction Separation
Extension (CSE) framework, introduced by Xu et al. (2018), overcame this
theoretical limitation by extending deduction beyond binary inference. However,
the original work did not specify how contradictions are algorithmically
constructed and extended in practice. This paper presents the Standard
Extension algorithm, the first explicit procedural realization of contradiction
separation reasoning. The proposed method dynamically constructs contradictions
through complementary literal extension, thereby operationalizing the CSE
theory within a unified algorithm for satisfiability and unsatisfiability
checking. The algorithm's soundness and completeness are formally proven, and
its effectiveness is supported indirectly through the performance of CSE-based
systems, including CSE, CSE-E, CSI-E, and CSI-Enig in major automated reasoning
competitions (CASC) in the last few years. These results confirm that the
Standard Extension mechanism constitutes a robust and practically validated
foundation for dynamic, multi-clause automated deduction.

</details>


<div id='cs.SI'></div>

# cs.SI [[Back]](#toc)

### [415] [From Keywords to Clusters: AI-Driven Analysis of YouTube Comments to Reveal Election Issue Salience in 2024](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07821)
*Raisa M. Simoes,Timoteo Kelly,Eduardo J. Simoes,Praveen Rao*

Main category: cs.SI

TL;DR: 本文探究了两种数据科学方法，利用人工智能技术分析了2024年总统大选前一周YouTube视频用户评论，以确定哪些议题对选民选择影响最大。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本文旨在探究两种相互竞争的数据科学方法，试图回答“哪些议题最能影响2024年总统大选选民的选择？”这个问题。

Method: 通过自然语言处理和聚类分析，挖掘了来自《华尔街日报》和《纽约时报》两个倾向性不同的期刊在选举前一周的8000多条YouTube视频评论，量化了所选议题在用户评论中的频率。

Result: 实证表明，移民和民主是用户评论中最常提及且持续被引用的议题，其次是身份政治，而通货膨胀的提及频率显著较低。

Conclusion: 分析结果证实了部分选后民意调查的发现，但也反驳了通货膨胀作为重要选举议题的说法。这表明，意见挖掘（分析原始用户数据）可能比民意调查和问卷调查更能揭示选举结果。

Abstract: This paper aims to explore two competing data science methodologies to
attempt answering the question, "Which issues contributed most to voters'
choice in the 2024 presidential election?" The methodologies involve novel
empirical evidence driven by artificial intelligence (AI) techniques. By using
two distinct methods based on natural language processing and clustering
analysis to mine over eight thousand user comments on election-related YouTube
videos from one right leaning journal, Wall Street Journal, and one left
leaning journal, New York Times, during pre-election week, we quantify the
frequency of selected issue areas among user comments to infer which issues
were most salient to potential voters in the seven days preceding the November
5th election. Empirically, we primarily demonstrate that immigration and
democracy were the most frequently and consistently invoked issues in user
comments on the analyzed YouTube videos, followed by the issue of identity
politics, while inflation was significantly less frequently referenced. These
results corroborate certain findings of post-election surveys but also refute
the supposed importance of inflation as an election issue. This indicates that
variations on opinion mining, with their analysis of raw user data online, can
be more revealing than polling and surveys for analyzing election outcomes.

</details>


### [416] [Do We Really Need SFT? Prompt-as-Policy over Knowledge Graphs for Cold-start Next POI Recommendation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08012)
*Jinze Wang,Lu Zhang,Yiyang Cui,Zhishu Shen,Xingjun Ma,Jiong Jin,Tiehua Zhang*

Main category: cs.SI

TL;DR: 通过知识图谱上的强化学习提示构建框架，动态生成推荐提示，以解决冷启动问题，并在真实数据集上取得显著改进。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 解决现有推荐系统中，尤其是在冷启动场景下，基于SFT和ICL的大型语言模型（LLM）在用户-兴趣点（POI）交互稀疏情况下的局限性。

Method: 提出一种名为Prompt-as-Policy的框架，利用强化学习（特别是上下文赌博机优化）来动态构建提示。该框架通过知识图谱发现候选POI并挖掘关系路径，将这些路径转化为“证据卡”，然后根据优化后的提示，由冻结的LLM生成推荐。

Result: 在三个真实世界的数据集上，Prompt-as-Policy相比现有最先进的方法，在不进行模型微调的情况下，在不活跃用户上的Acc@1指标上平均实现了7.7%的相对提升，同时在活跃用户上保持了有竞争力的性能。

Conclusion: Prompt-as-Policy通过动态生成提示，有效地解决了冷启动下的POI推荐问题，尤其是在用户交互稀疏的情况下，并且无需对LLM进行微调。

Abstract: Next point-of-interest (POI) recommendation is crucial for smart urban
services such as tourism, dining, and transportation, yet most approaches
struggle under cold-start conditions where user-POI interactions are sparse.
Recent efforts leveraging large language models (LLMs) address this challenge
through either supervised fine-tuning (SFT) or in-context learning (ICL).
However, SFT demands costly annotations and fails to generalize to inactive
users, while static prompts in ICL cannot adapt to diverse user contexts. To
overcome these limitations, we propose Prompt-as-Policy over knowledge graphs,
a reinforcement-guided prompting framework that learns to construct prompts
dynamically through contextual bandit optimization. Our method treats prompt
construction as a learnable policy that adaptively determines (i) which
relational evidences to include, (ii) the number of evidence per candidate, and
(iii) their organization and ordering within prompts. More specifically, we
construct a knowledge graph (KG) to discover candidates and mine relational
paths, which are transformed into evidence cards that summarize rationales for
each candidate POI. The frozen LLM then acts as a reasoning engine, generating
recommendations from the KG-discovered candidate set based on the
policy-optimized prompts. Experiments on three real-world datasets demonstrate
that Prompt-as-Policy consistently outperforms state-of-the-art baselines,
achieving average 7.7\% relative improvements in Acc@1 for inactive users,
while maintaining competitive performance on active users, without requiring
model fine-tuning.

</details>


### [417] [Geometric opinion exchange polarizes in every dimension](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08190)
*Abdou Majeed Alidou,Júlia Baligács,Jan Hązła*

Main category: cs.SI

TL;DR: 该研究证明了在d维空间中，基于偏差同化的意见更新模型会导致意见的两极分化，解决了d>=3的开放性问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究之前模型在d=2时证明了意见的两极分化，但d>=3的普遍情况仍未解决。

Method: 使用对模型动力学更深入的理解和随机过程理论的工具来解决d>=3的情况。

Result: 证明了在d>=3时，该模型也会导致意见的两极分化。

Conclusion: 该研究解决了d>=3时意见更新模型两极分化的普遍情况。

Abstract: A recent line of work studies models of opinion exchange where agent opinions
about $d$ topics are tracked simultaneously. The opinions are represented as
vectors on the unit $(d-1)$-sphere, and the update rule is based on the overall
correlation between the relevant vectors. The update rule reflects the
assumption of biased assimilation, i.e., a pair of opinions is brought closer
together if their correlation is positive and further apart if the correlation
is negative.
  This model seems to induce the polarization of opinions into two antipodal
groups. This is in contrast to many other known models which tend to achieve
consensus. The polarization property has been recently proved for $d=2$, but
the general case of $d \ge 3$ remained open. In this work, we settle the
general case, using a more detailed understanding of the model dynamics and
tools from the theory of random processes.

</details>


### [418] [Forecasting the Buzz: Enriching Hashtag Popularity Prediction with LLM Reasoning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08481)
*Yifei Xu,Jiaying Wu,Herun Wan,Yang Li,Zhen Hou,Min-Yen Kan*

Main category: cs.SI

TL;DR: BuzzProphet是一个增强推理能力的标签流行度预测框架，通过结合LLM的语境推理和传统回归器的数值预测能力，提高了预测准确性和可解释性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 预测哪个标签会病毒式传播仍然是一个难题，传统方法忽略了语境，而LLM在数值估计上存在不足。

Method: BuzzProphet框架首先指示LLM阐述标签的主题传播性、受众覆盖范围和时效性优势，然后利用这些面向流行度的理由来丰富输入特征，最后进行回归预测。

Result: BuzzProphet在各种回归器-LLM组合中，将RMSE降低了多达2.8%，并将相关性提高了30%，同时还能生成人类可读的解释。HashView（一个包含7,532个标签的数据集）被发布用于评估。

Conclusion: 将LLM用作语境推理器而非数值预测器，可以将领域洞察力注入表格模型，从而为社交媒体趋势预测提供一个可解释且可部署的解决方案。

Abstract: Hashtag trends ignite campaigns, shift public opinion, and steer millions of
dollars in advertising spend, yet forecasting which tag goes viral is elusive.
Classical regressors digest surface features but ignore context, while large
language models (LLMs) excel at contextual reasoning but misestimate numbers.
We present BuzzProphet, a reasoning-augmented hashtag popularity prediction
framework that (1) instructs an LLM to articulate a hashtag's topical virality,
audience reach, and timing advantage; (2) utilizes these popularity-oriented
rationales to enrich the input features; and (3) regresses on these inputs. To
facilitate evaluation, we release HashView, a 7,532-hashtag benchmark curated
from social media. Across diverse regressor-LLM combinations, BuzzProphet
reduces RMSE by up to 2.8% and boosts correlation by 30% over baselines, while
producing human-readable rationales. Results demonstrate that using LLMs as
context reasoners rather than numeric predictors injects domain insight into
tabular models, yielding an interpretable and deployable solution for social
media trend forecasting.

</details>


<div id='cond-mat.mes-hall'></div>

# cond-mat.mes-hall [[Back]](#toc)

### [419] [Pareto-optimality of Majoranas in hybrid platforms](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07406)
*Juan Daniel Torres Luna,Sebastian Miles,A. Mert Bozkurt,Chun-Xiao Liu,Antonio L. R. Manesco,Anton R. Akhmerov,Michael Wimmer*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 半导体纳米线和量子点链在Majorana复合态（MBS）的拓扑间隙和局域长度之间存在权衡，量子点链在MBS质量和较短局域长度方面表现出优势，更适合近期量子计算应用。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 需要优化Majorana复合态（MBS）的质量指标，以用作量子比特，但拓扑间隙和局域长度这两个关键指标之间存在固有权衡。

Method: 采用多目标优化方法，系统比较了近邻半导体纳米线和量子点链中的MBS质量，分析了拓扑间隙和局域长度之间的基本权衡。

Result: 在量子点链和纳米线模型中，拓扑间隙和局域长度无法同时优化，形成了定义可实现参数空间的帕累托前沿。量子点链在实现与纳米线相当的MBS质量的同时，还可以达到更短的局域长度。

Conclusion: 量子点链在Majorana复合态（MBS）方面展现出与纳米线相当的质量，并且具有更短的局域长度，这使其在设备长度和无序性受限的近期量子计算应用中具有巨大潜力。

Abstract: To observe Majorana bound states, and especially to use them as a qubit,
requires careful optimization of competing quality metrics. We systematically
compare Majorana quality in proximitized semiconductor nanowires and quantum
dot chains. Using multi-objective optimization, we analyze the fundamental
trade-offs between topological gap and localization length, two key metrics
that determine MBS coherence and operational fidelity. We demonstrate that
these quantities cannot be simultaneously optimized in realistic models,
creating Pareto frontiers that define the achievable parameter space. Our
results show that QD chains achieve both comparable quality as nanowires and a
regime with a much shorter localization length, making them particularly
promising for near-term quantum computing applications where device length and
disorder are limiting factors.

</details>


### [420] [From two dimensions to wire networks in a dice-lattice Josephson array](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07412)
*J. D. Bondar,L. Banszerus,W. Marshall,T. Lindemann,T. Zhang,M. J. Manfra,C. M. Marcus,S. Vaitiekėnas*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 约瑟夫森耦合的器件在磁通量作用下表现出复杂的开关电流模式，不同掺杂的器件表现不同，理论模型与实验结果吻合。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究约瑟夫森阵列在磁通量作用下的行为，以及门控对器件特性的影响。

Method: 通过实验制备并测量了由超导弱连接和近邻半导体组成的骰子格子状约瑟夫森阵列，并独立调控了弱连接的约瑟夫森耦合和 the plaquettes 中的电子密度。

Result: 对于掺杂量较低的器件，开关电流几乎呈周期性；对于掺杂量较高的器件，开关电流随着磁通量的增加而减小。建立的基于小面积约瑟夫森结和 the plaquettes 的模型与实验结果吻合。 

Conclusion: 约瑟夫森阵列的行为受到磁通量和掺杂量的影响，实验结果可以通过理论模型得到很好地解释。

Abstract: We investigate Josephson arrays consisting of a dice-lattice network of
superconducting weak links surrounding rhombic plaquettes of proximitized
semiconductor. Josephson coupling of the weak links and electron density in the
plaquettes are independently controlled by separate electrostatic gates.
Applied magnetic flux results in an intricate pattern of switching currents
associated with frustration, $f$. For depleted plaquettes, the switching
current is nearly periodic in $f$, expected for a phase-only description, while
occupied plaquettes yield a decreasing envelope of switching currents with
increasing $f$. A model of flux dependence based on ballistic small-area
junctions and diffusive large-area plaquettes yields excellent agreement with
experiment.

</details>


### [421] [Quantum Filtering of Hydrogen Isotopes through Graphene](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07461)
*Joshua Hale,Theja N. De Silva*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 利用石墨烯的量子隧穿效应分离氢同位素。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了满足能源、医疗和工业领域对氢同位素分离日益增长的需求，研究一种分离因子高且具有经济可行性的氢同位素分离技术。

Method: 使用新开发的氢同位素与石墨烯碳原子间的解析成对势，研究同位素在石墨烯层附近的经典轨迹以及同位素隧穿石墨烯层的量子力学性质。利用各种量子力学方法计算同位素隧穿概率和量子力学同位素吸附概率。

Result: 研究表明，通过石墨烯层的量子过滤是一种有效的方法，可以通过分离氕来富集氘。

Conclusion: 量子过滤技术可以作为一种有效的分离方法，用于从氕中富集氘。

Abstract: Driven by the growing demand in the energy, medical, and industrial sectors,
we investigate a hydrogen isotope separation technique that offers both a high
separation factor and economic feasibility. Our findings reveal that filtering
isotopes through two-dimensional graphene layers provides an exceptionally
efficient quantum-mechanical method for isotope separation. Using a recently
developed analytical pairwise potential between hydrogen isotopes and carbon
atoms in graphene, we examine the classical trajectories of isotopes near the
graphene layer, as well as the quantum-mechanical tunneling properties of
isotopes through the graphene layer. Using various quantum-mechanical methods,
we calculate both the isotope tunneling probabilities and the
quantum-mechanical isotope sticking probabilities. Our study shows that quantum
filtering through graphene layers can be an effective technique for enriching
deuterium by separating it from protium.

</details>


### [422] [Nonreciprocal Spin-Wave Dynamics in Crescent-Shaped Ferromagnetic Nanowires](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07574)
*Uladzislau Makartsou,Mateusz Gołębiewski,Attila Kákay,Olena Tartakivska,Maciej Krawczyk*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 文章研究了新月形纳米线中的自旋波传播及其非互易性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究新月形纳米线横截面几何形状和外加磁场对自旋波传播特性的影响，以及几何形状和外磁场强度如何影响磁化动力学和自旋波幅度分布。

Method: 利用微磁模拟和解析建模相结合的方法，系统地分析了新月形纳米线中自旋波的传播。

Result: 研究结果表明，新月形横截面几何形状和外加磁场会改变自旋波的色散关系及其非互易性，且这种非互易性会因模式类型而异。

Conclusion: 这项工作在弯曲几何形状的自旋波动力学基础理解上取得了进展，并为设计具有特定性能的磁子波导提供了新的视角。

Abstract: Recent progress in the study of spin-wave propagation in ferromagnetic
waveguides has highlighted the role of nonreciprocity arising from both the
interfacial Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction and the chiral nature of dipolar
interactions. In this paper, we examine how a nanowire with a crescent-shaped
cross-section affects spin-wave propagation along its long axis when a bias
magnetic field is applied perpendicular to the axis. Employing micromagnetic
simulations supported by analytical modeling, we systematically analyze the
effects of geometry and external magnetic field strength on the magnetization
dynamics and spin-wave amplitude distribution. The results demonstrate that
these factors modify the dispersion relation of spin waves and influence its
nonreciprocity, which can vary depending on the mode type. This work advances
the fundamental understanding of spin-wave dynamics in curved geometries and
offers new perspectives for designing magnonic waveguides with tailored
properties.

</details>


### [423] [Three-Dimensional Electrostatic and Quantum-Confinement Modeling of Silicon Nanowire Double Quantum Dots](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07831)
*Nilesh Pandey,Dipanjan Basu,Leonard F Register,Sanjay K Banerjee*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 使用Sentaurus QTX对硅纳米线双量子点进行三维模拟，研究了宽度、限制、谷分裂和隧穿耦合的影响，为器件设计提供了指导。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统方法在处理硅纳米线双量子点器件的复杂三维静电学方面存在局限性，需要一种能够捕获波函数演化、子带形成和谷分裂的三维模拟方法。

Method: 采用Sentaurus QTX，将三维泊松求解器与二维薛定谔求解器自洽耦合，模拟了硅纳米线双量子点的电子特性。

Result: 模拟结果表明，窄量子点（宽度=5 nm）具有强限制、增强的谷分裂和稳定的单电子局域化；宽量子点（宽度=20 nm）在较低栅极电压下可实现单电子占据，但量子阱较浅，波函数中存在高阶模式。量子点宽度显著影响隧穿耦合，窄宽度增强耦合，宽宽度则减弱耦合，并在宽度约为柱塞栅长度的两倍时趋于饱和。

Conclusion: 量子点宽度、柱塞栅长度和栅极长度的组合对导带分布和量子点间耦合有显著影响，模拟结果可为设计硅纳米线双量子点器件提供几何控制的指导。

Abstract: We present a three-dimensional simulation study of silicon nanowire double
quantum dots with leads, which extends beyond traditional effective-mass or
quasi-1D and quasi-2D approaches typically applied to bulk or planar
geometries. Using the Sentaurus QTX, we self-consistently couple a 3-D Poisson
solver with two-dimensional Schr\"odinger solutions along the strongly confined
width * thickness cross-sections normal to the transport direction, yielding
bound-state energies and wavefunctions across the device cross-section. This
method captures wavefunction evolution, subband formation, and valley splitting
while retaining the full three-dimensional electrostatics of the device. Our
results show that narrow quantum dots (width = 5 nm) provide strong
confinement, enhanced valley splitting, and robust single-electron
localization, whereas wider quantum dots (width = 20 nm) allow single-electron
occupation at lower gate voltages but with shallower quantum wells and
additional higher-order modes in the wavefunction. Importantly, the quantum dot
width also plays a key role in tunnel coupling: smaller channel widths enhance
wavefunction overlap across the barrier, resulting in higher tunnel coupling,
whereas increasing the width reduces coupling, which eventually saturates once
the width is approximately twice the plunger-gate length. By systematically
varying the quantum dot width together with plunger- and barrier-gate lengths,
we investigate their combined influence on the conduction-band profile and
interdot coupling. Together, these simulations provide design guidelines for
geometry-driven control of confinement, valley splitting, and tunnel coupling
in silicon nanowire double quantum dots.

</details>


### [424] [Low-Temperature Skyrmions and Spiral Reorientation Processes in Chiral Magnets with Cubic Anisotropy: Guidelines for Bridging Theory and Experiment](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07640)
*A. O. Leonov,G. Gödecke,J. Grefe,S. Süllow,D. Menzel*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 立方晶磁各向异性能稳定低温斯格明子相，并提供了指导实验的理论框架。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本研究旨在重新审视现象学德热洛夫框架，并阐明磁晶立方各向异性如何重塑状态相图，以及其在稳定低温斯格明子相中的关键作用。

Method: 通过分析磁场方向沿易磁化轴时的相图，研究了稳定斯格明子区域，并分析了临界场H_c1和H_c2下的相变机制，还映射了理论相图中的特征参数，以连接理论与实验。

Result: 证明了立方晶磁各向异性在磁场沿易磁化轴时，对各向异性常数的符号不敏感，均可形成稳定的斯格明子区域。研究了临界场H_c1和H_c2下的相变。提供了映射特征参数的指南，用于估算Fe1-xCoxSi和MnSi的立方各向异性常数。指出Fe1-xCoxSi（x约0.1）具有足够的立方各向异性来稳定低温斯格明子相。

Conclusion: 该理论为预测和解释其他立方磁体中斯格明子的稳定性提供了定量框架。

Abstract: We revisit the phenomenological Dzyaloshinskii framework, a central
theoretical approach for describing magnetization processes in bulk chiral
magnets, and demonstrate how magnetocrystalline cubic anisotropy reshapes the
phase diagrams of states and provides the key mechanism stabilizing
low-temperature skyrmion phases. We show that, for magnetic field directions
along the easy anisotropy axes, the phase diagrams feature stable skyrmion
pockets for both signs of the anisotropy constant. We further analyze the
nature of the transitions at the critical field $H_{c1}$, associated with the
reorientation of stable and metastable spirals along the field. We also examine
the transition at $H_{c2}$, where the conical state closes into the homogeneous
state accompanied by a deviation of the wave vector from the field direction.
By mapping characteristic anisotropy-dependent parameters in the theoretical
phase diagrams, we provide guidelines for connecting theory with experiment and
for estimating the cubic anisotropy constant in Fe$_{1-x}$Co$_x$Si and MnSi.
Our results indicate that samples Fe$_{1-x}$Co$_x$Si with small $x \sim 0.1$
possess sufficiently strong cubic anisotropy to stabilize a low-temperature
skyrmion phase. Overall, these theoretical findings establish a quantitative
framework for predicting and interpreting skyrmion stability in other cubic
helimagnets as well.

</details>


### [425] [Dominant scattering mechanisms and mobility peak in cryogenic 2D electron transport in Silicon (110) confinement by high-k oxides](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08220)
*Hsin-Wen Huang,Xi-Jun Fang,Edward Chen,Yuh-Renn Wu*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 硅纳米器件在低温下的性能对量子计算至关重要。通过对Si (110)系统的多谷蒙特卡罗模拟，我们发现了低温下电子传输物理学的根本性转变。声子散射变得可以忽略不计，迁移率由低载流子密度下的远程库仑散射(RCS)和高密度下的表面粗糙度散射(SRS)之间的竞争决定。这种竞争产生了独特的电子迁移率峰值。此外，我们展示了高κ电介质(如HfO2)的关键设计权衡：虽然增强了栅极控制，但它们引入了强烈的远程声子散射，这会抑制迁移率。这些发现为下一代低温纳米器件的材料选择和设计提供了重要的指导。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 低温下硅纳米器件的性能对于量子计算技术至关重要。

Method: 通过对Si (110)系统的多谷蒙特卡罗模拟，研究电子传输物理学。

Result: 低温下声子散射可忽略不计，迁移率受RCS和SRS竞争决定，出现迁移率峰值。高κ电介质(如HfO2)会引入远程声子散射，可能抑制迁移率。

Conclusion: 低温下电子迁移率受RCS和SRS竞争影响，并提出了高κ电介质的设计权衡，为下一代低温纳米器件的材料选择和设计提供了指导。

Abstract: The performance of silicon nano-devices at cryogenic temperatures is critical
for quantum computing technologies. Through multi-valley Monte Carlo
simulations of Si (110) systems, we reveal a fundamental shift in electron
transport physics at low temperatures. Phonon scattering becomes negligible,
and mobility is instead dictated by a competition between remote Coulomb
scattering (RCS) at low carrier densities and surface roughness scattering
(SRS) at high densities. This competition creates a distinct peak in electron
mobility. Furthermore, we demonstrate a critical design trade-off for
high-$\kappa$ dielectrics like $\mathrm{HfO_2}$: while enhancing gate control,
they introduce strong remote phonon scattering, which can suppress mobility.
These findings provide essential guidelines for the material selection and
design of next-generation cryogenic nano-devices.

</details>


### [426] [Superconducting meander-line surface coil for NMR spectroscopy of nanoscale thin films](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07679)
*Louis Beaudoin,Aimé Verrier,Youcef A. Bioud,Mathieu Massicotte,Bertrand Reulet,Jeffrey A. Quilliam*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: NMR 灵敏度低，限制了其在二维材料和纳米薄膜中的应用。我们开发了一种基于超导 meander 表面线圈的新型探针，大大提高了薄样品的 NMR 灵敏度。使用优化的 NbN meander 几何形状，我们探测了 150 nm 厚的硼薄膜（约 2x10^16 个 $^{11}$B 核自旋）的 NMR 信号。自旋回波测量和理论模型揭示了限制线圈性能的因素。这项工作为开发高灵敏度 NMR 探针奠定了基础，有望为研究原子级薄材料带来新机遇。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统的固态 NMR 灵敏度低，需要大量自旋，限制了其在二维材料和纳米薄膜等样品量有限的材料研究中的应用。

Method: 开发了一种基于超导 meander 表面线圈的新型探针，以提高 NMR 灵敏度。

Result: 成功探测了 150 nm 厚的硼薄膜（约 2x10^16 个 $^{11}$B 核自旋）的 NMR 信号，证明了该技术在低核自旋数量下的有效性。

Conclusion: 这项工作为开发高灵敏度 NMR 探针奠定了基础，为研究原子级薄材料提供了新的可能性。

Abstract: Nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) spectroscopy is a powerful technique to
study local magnetism in a variety of materials. However, the inherently low
sensitivity of conventional inductively detected solid state NMR typically
requires a large number of spins, reducing its applicability to two-dimensional
(2D) materials and nanoscale thin films. To overcome this experimental
challenge, we introduce a novel probe based on a superconducting meander-line
surface coil that significantly enhances the NMR sensitivity for thin samples.
Using a NbN meander with an optimized geometry, we demonstrate the sensitivity
of this technique by detecting the NMR signal of a 150-nm-thick boron film
containing only $\sim 2\times10^{16}$ $^{11}$B nuclear spins. Spin-echo
measurements and theoretical modeling offer insight into the parameters
limiting the coil's performance. This work lays the foundation for developing
highly sensitive NMR probes, potentially unlocking new opportunities for
studying atomically thin materials.

</details>


### [427] [Thermoelectric Enhancement of Series-Connected Cross-Conjugated Molecular Junctions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07694)
*Justin P. Bergfield*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 通过量子输运理论研究了单分子结的热电响应，发现增加重复单元数量可以增强热电效应，并提出了基于分节点材料的量子增强热电响应新途径。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究具有重复单元的交叉共轭分子在单分子结中的热电响应，以探索量子增强热电效应的新机制。

Method: 利用多体量子输运理论，分析了重复单元数量、分节点光谱展宽与热电响应（特别是热电势）的关系，并评估了电子品质因数ZT和最大热力学效率的标度律。

Result: 随着重复单元数量的增加，基本能隙保持不变，但分节点光谱展宽，显著提高了热电势。这种量子增强效应超过了其他基于干涉的机制，例如节点合并成超节点。

Conclusion: 分节点（split-node）材料具有实现量子增强热电响应的潜力，为设计可扩展的量子干涉基材料提供了新思路。研究结果适用于具有多个串联干涉节点的各种体系。

Abstract: We investigate the thermoelectric response of single-molecule junctions
composed of acyclic cross-conjugated molecules, including dendralene analogues
and related iso-poly(diacetylene) (iso-PDA) motifs, in which node-possessing
repeat units are connected in series. Using many-body quantum transport theory,
we show that increasing the number of repeat units leaves the fundamental gap
essentially unchanged while giving rise to a split-node spectrum whose
cumulative broadening dramatically enhances the thermopower. This form of
quantum enhancement can exceed other interference-based mechanisms, such as the
coalescence of nodes into a supernode, suggesting new opportunities for
scalable quantum-interference-based materials. Although illustrated here with
cross-conjugated systems, the underlying principles apply broadly to
series-connected architectures hosting multiple interference nodes. Finally, we
evaluate the scaling of the electronic figure of merit ZT and the maximum
thermodynamic efficiency. Together, these results highlight the potential for
split-node-based materials to realize quantum-enhanced thermoelectric response.

</details>


### [428] [Phase-controlled quantum transport signatures in a quantum dot-Majorana hybrid ring system](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07826)
*Sirui Yu,Junrong Wang,Huajin Zhao,Hong Mao,Jinshuang Jin*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 量子输运在混合量子点-马约拉纳费米子系统中表现出周期性振荡和零偏压峰值，噪声则展现出亚泊松、泊松和超泊松行为，并在平衡点出现巨大的法诺因子，但热效应会削弱这些特征。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本研究旨在探索由量子点和拓扑超导纳米线中的马约拉纳束缚态组成的混合环状系统的量子输运特性，特别是磁通量对系统的影响。

Method: 采用耗散动力学方程进行计算。

Result: 研究发现微分电导呈现周期性行为，且周期性与量子点能量和马约拉纳束缚态重叠有关。零偏压峰值是由于正常和异常隧穿过程的平衡所致。此外，散弹噪声在电压依赖下呈现亚泊松、泊松和超泊松状态的转变，并在平衡点附近出现巨大的法诺因子和噪声峰值。

Conclusion: 零偏压峰值和巨大的法诺因子是马约拉纳束缚态存在的潜在探测信号，但需要注意热效应对这些现象的削弱作用。

Abstract: We investigate the quantum transport in a hybrid ring system consisting of a
quantum dot (QD) coupled to two Majorana bound states (MBSs) hosted in a
topological superconducting nanowire, threaded by a magnetic flux. Utilizing
the dissipaton equation-of-motion approach, we demonstrate that the
differential conductance shows periodic behavior and its periodicity depends on
both the QD energy level and the MBS overlapping. A zero-bias peak (ZBP)
emerges as a result of the balance between normal and anomalous tunneling
processes, associated with the presence of a single MBS. Beyond the
phase-dependent periodic behavior, the shot noise exhibits voltage-dependent
transitions between sub-Poissonian ($F = 0.5$), Poissonian ($F = 1$), and
super-Poissonian ($F > 1$) regimes. Strikingly, we find a giant Fano factor
($F\gg1$) emerging at the balance point, accompanied by a peak in the shot
noise. This distinctive feature may serve as a supplementary signature for MBS
detection. However, both ZBP in the differential conductance and shot noise
peak are degraded by thermal effects.

</details>


### [429] [On the decoherence of Majorana zero modes mediated by gapless fermions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07893)
*Sauri Bhattacharyya,Marco Grilli,Bernard van Heck*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: Majorana零模与电子气相互作用导致退相干，通过Lindblad主方程描述了耗散动力学，发现长距离耦合导致弛豫时间长，但可通过距离调节抑制。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究弱耦合到无相互作用电子气的Majorana零模的退相干问题。

Method: 使用Born-Markov近似推导Majorana零模的Lindblad主方程，并进行谱分析，最后通过与全密度矩阵的无偏数值模拟进行比较来验证。

Result: 推导出的Lindblad主方程的跳跃算符是非局域的，这导致了耗散动力学可能表现出长弛豫时间（即费米子奇偶性的缓慢衰减）。谱分析表明，Majorana零模之间的距离会以幂律关系抑制这种弛豫时间的减慢。数值模拟验证了Lindblad方程的有效性，并揭示了在短时间内非马尔可夫动力学建立了非局域关联。

Conclusion: Majorana零模的退相干动力学可以通过Lindblad主方程来描述，长距离耦合是导致弛豫时间长的关键因素，但可以通过增加Majorana零模之间的距离来缓解。非马尔可夫动力学在短时间内会产生非局域关联。

Abstract: We study the decoherence of a collection of Majorana zero modes weakly
coupled to a gapless reservoir of non-interacting fermions. Using the
Born-Markov approximation, we derive a Lindblad master equation for the
dissipative dynamics of the Majorana zero modes. Due to the long-range coupling
between Majorana zero modes mediated by the gapless reservoir, the Lindblad
jump operators are non-local linear combinations of the Majorana operators. We
show that, as a consequence, the dissipative dynamics can exhibit long
relaxation times, i.e. a slow decay of fermion parities. A spectral analysis of
the Liouvillian shows that the slow-down is suppressed as a power law of the
distance between Majorana zero modes. Finally, we validate the Lindblad
equation by comparison with unbiased numerical simulations of the time
evolution of the full density matrix. In particular, these illustrate that
non-Markovian dynamics establishes non-local correlations at small times.

</details>


### [430] [Topological Magnon-Plasmon Hybrids](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07916)
*Tomoki Hirosawa,Pieter M. Gunnink,Alexander Mook*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 该研究探讨了范德华层堆叠结构中的磁振子-等离激元耦合及其与能带拓扑的关系，发现这种耦合会产生贝里曲率，进而导致反常霍尔效应和自旋诺尔效应。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究磁振子-等离激元耦合在二维范德华层堆叠结构中的能带拓扑背景下的表现，以及其产生的物理效应。

Method: 利用拟粒子近似，分析了金属层中的等离激元与磁性层中的磁振子之间的磁偶极耦合如何产生贝里曲率。

Result: 磁振子-等离激元耦合导致混合拟粒子获得反常速度，从而在铁磁体和反铁磁体中产生固有的反常霍尔效应和自旋诺尔效应。研究还提出了支持斯格明子晶体的磁性层作为实现手征磁振子-等离激元边缘态的平台。

Conclusion: 磁耦合可以诱导拓扑效应，并提出“拓扑磁振子-等离子体学”的概念，为实现手征磁振子-等离激元边缘态提供了新途径。

Abstract: We study magnon-plasmon coupling in effectively two-dimensional stacks of van
der Waals layers in the context of the band structure topology. Invoking the
quasiparticle approximation, we show that the magnetic dipole coupling between
the plasmons in a metallic layer and the magnons in a neighboring magnetic
layer gives rise to a Berry curvature. As a result, the hybrid quasiparticles
acquire an anomalous velocity, leading to intrinsic anomalous thermal Hall and
spin-Nernst effects in ferromagnets and antiferromagnets. We propose magnetic
layers supporting skyrmion crystals as a platform to realize chiral
magnon-plasmon edge states, inviting the notion of topological
magnon-plasmonics.

</details>


### [431] [Atomically resolved electron reflectivity at a metal/semiconductor interface](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07970)
*Ding-Ming Huang,Jian-Huan Wang,Jie-Yin Zhang,Yuan Yao,H. Q. Xu,Jian-Jun Zhang*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 通过分子束外延在面心立方Al和金刚石晶格Ge之间实现了原子级平整的界面，STM测量显示Al/Ge界面处电子反射率存在原子级周期性变化，最高变化幅度达24%。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在Al/Ge异质结构中寻找非破坏性的界面态检测方法。

Method: 使用分子束外延（MBE）生长Al/Ge界面，并利用扫描隧道显微镜（STM）进行测量。

Result: 观察到Al/Ge界面处电子反射率在2纳米范围内存在高达24%的周期性变化，并推测这是由界面处的局域电子态引起的。

Conclusion: 该研究提供了一种使用STM原子级非破坏性地检测异质结构中埋藏界面态的新方法。

Abstract: An atomically flat interface is achieved between face-centered cubic Al and
diamond lattice Ge via molecular beam epitaxy (MBE). Based on the measurements
of scanning tunneling microscopy (STM), we demonstrate an atomically resolved
lateral periodic change of the electron reflectivity at the Al/Ge interface.
The variation of electron reflectivity is up to 24% in lateral 2 nm. We
speculate that the change of reflectivity results from the local electronic
states at the Al/Ge interface. This phenomenon provides an atomically
non-destructive method for detecting the buried interfacial states in
hetero-structures by STM.

</details>


### [432] [Magnetic-Field Control of Tomonaga-Luttinger Liquids in Ta2Pd3Te5 Edge States](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07973)
*Xingchen Guo Anqi Wang,Xiutong Deng,Yupeng Li,Guoan Li,Zhiyuan Zhang,Xiaofan Shi,Xiao Deng,Ziwei Dou,Guangtong Liu,Fanming Qu,Zhijun Wang,Tian Qian,Youguo Shi,Li Lu,Jie Shen*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: Ta2Pd3Te5材料的准一维边缘通道表现出鲁棒且可调的Tomonaga-Luttinger液体行为，通过外部磁场可以调控其Zeeman劈裂，为实现Majorana零模和量子计算提供了新的途径。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究Ta2Pd3Te5材料的边缘通道特性，探索其在量子计算和Majorana零模方面的应用潜力。

Method: 通过静电门控调控Ta2Pd3Te5材料的化学势，并施加磁场研究边缘通道的Tomonaga-Luttinger液体行为及其对磁场的响应，包括Zeeman劈裂和各向异性。

Result: 发现Ta2Pd3Te5的准一维边缘通道具有鲁棒且可调的Tomonaga-Luttinger液体特性，并且可以通过静电门控来调控。施加磁场可以引入Zeeman劈裂，并系统性地增加TLL幂律指数alpha。此外，观察到alpha对磁场方向具有明显的二重各向异性，这源于与取向相关的边缘g因子。

Conclusion: Ta2Pd3Te5材料为实现Majorana零模和量子计算提供了一个有前途的平台。通过门控调控和磁场诱导的Zeeman劈裂，可以打破时间反转对称性，并构建拓扑超导相，为Majorana基量子器件的工程化铺平了道路。

Abstract: Ta2Pd3Te5 is a quasi-one-dimensional transition-metal telluride whose heavy
atoms endow the material with strong spin-orbit coupling, while the Fermi level
inside the bulk gap makes the low-energy electronic structure highly
tunable.Theory and early experiments have already identified a wealth of
emergent phases in this platform: an excitonic insulator driven by
electron-hole binding, a second-order topological insulator protected by
crystalline symmetry, a potential topological-protected quantum-spin-Hall edge,
and proximity-induced edge supercurrents when coupled to a conventional s-wave
superconductor. These properties make it a promising platform for hosting
Majorana zero modes and quantum computation, provided that time-reversal
symmetry can be broken by a Zeeman gap. In this work, we demonstrate that the
one-dimensional edge channels of exfoliated Ta2Pd3Te5 host a robust and tunable
Tomonaga-Luttinger liquid by electrostatic gating because it shifts the
chemical potential across the bulk gap without changing the gap size. More
importantly, the application of a magnetic field introduces a Zeeman gap that
systematically increases the TLL power-law exponent alpha. Furthermore,
rotating the field reveals a pronounced twofold anisotropy--alpha is maximal
for a field parallel to the edge and minimal for a perpendicular
orientation--originating from an orientation-dependent edge g-factor that is
likely amplified by quantum-confinement-induced orbital-angular-moment
quenching. The existence of gate-tunable edge supercurrents together with the
field-controlled Zeeman gap provides a direct route to break time-reversal
symmetry in a particle-hole-symmetric superconducting gap and thus to engineer
a topological superconducting phase, paving the way towards Majorana-based
quantum devices.

</details>


### [433] [Gate Voltage Tunable Second Harmonic Generation in Mono- and Bi-layer Black Phosphene](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08014)
*Yan Meng,Kainan Chang,Yanyan Qian,Luxia Wang,Jin Luo Cheng*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 黑磷（BP）因其可调带隙、高载流子迁移率和显著的平面内各向异性，已成为可调非线性光子学的有前景的平台。本研究利用紧束缚模型描述电子态，利用半导体布洛赫方程描述动力学，研究了单层和双层BP在外部静电场下的二次谐波（SHG）产生。结果表明，BP在扶手椅方向上表现出大的二阶非线性光学响应，当入射光子能量接近其带隙的一半时，会产生显著的共振增强。在$10^7$ V/m的电场下，BP的有效二阶非线性磁导率高达$10^3$ pm/V，比传统非线性晶体AgGaSe$_2$的性能高一个数量级以上。通过与栅极电压引起的静电场对比，我们讨论了电场诱导二次谐波（EFISH）产生与传统SHG的关系——在较低栅极电压下，EFISH方法与SHG解基本一致，但在较高栅极电压下，EFISH方法不再适用。具体而言，随着栅极电压的增加，单层BP的带隙会扩展，并且SHG共振峰会发生蓝移。相比之下，双层BP会经历从半导体到半金属的转变，形成狄拉克锥，并在光子能量趋于零时产生发散的SHG光谱。此外，化学势可以精确控制带间和带内非线性响应。该研究为基于BP的可调非线性光子器件的发展提供了重要的理论基础，并拓展了各向异性二维材料在非线性光学中的应用潜力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 黑磷（BP）作为一种二维材料，具有可调带隙、高载流子迁移率和各向异性等优良特性，在非线性光子学领域展现出巨大潜力。本研究旨在深入理解BP在外部电场作用下的二次谐波（SHG）产生机制及其可调性，为开发新型非线性光学器件提供理论指导。

Method: 本研究采用紧束缚模型来描述单层和双层黑磷（BP）的电子结构，并结合半导体布洛赫方程来模拟其非线性光学动力学。通过理论计算，研究了BP在不同电场强度和光子能量下的二次谐波（SHG）响应。

Result: 研究结果表明，BP在扶手椅方向上表现出优异的二阶非线性光学响应，且当入射光子能量接近带隙一半时，会发生显著的共振增强。在$10^7$ V/m的电场下，BP的有效二阶非线性磁导率高达$10^3$ pm/V，远超AgGaSe$_2$。此外，研究还发现，随着电场增强，单层BP的带隙会扩展并蓝移，而双层BP则会发生半导体-半金属相变，形成狄拉克锥并导致SHG光谱发散。化学势可以用于精细调控带间和带内非线性响应。

Conclusion: 本研究为开发基于黑磷（BP）的可调谐非线性光子器件提供了重要的理论基础，并证明了BP在非线性光学领域，特别是在可调谐光学器件方面，具有广阔的应用前景。同时，该研究也扩展了各向异性二维材料在非线性光学中的应用潜力。

Abstract: Black phosphorene (BP) has emerged as a promising platform for tunable
nonlinear photonics due to its layer-dependent bandgap, high carrier mobility,
and remarkable in-plane anisotropy. This study investigates the second-harmonic
generation (SHG) of monolayer and bilayer BP under an external static electric
field, with describing the electronic states by a tight-binding model and the
dynamics by semiconductor Bloch equations. Our results reveal that BP exhibits
large second-order nonlinear optical response along the armchair direction,
with significant resonant enhancement when the incident photon energy
approaches half of its bandgap. Under an applied electric field of $10^7$ V/m,
the effective second-order nonlinear susceptibility of BP can be as large as
$10^3$ pm/V, surpassing that of the conventional nonlinear crystal AgGaSe$_2$
by more than an order of magnitude. With respect to the static electric field
induced by gate voltage, we discuss the relation between the
electric-field-induced second harmonic (EFISH) generation and conventional SHG
-- under lower gate voltage, the EFISH approach agrees well with the SHG
solutions, whereas the former is no longer applicable under higher gate
voltage. Specifically, as the increasing gate voltage, monolayer BP exhibits
the bandgap expansion and the corresponding blue-shift in the SHG resonant
peak. In contrast, bilayer BP undergoes a semiconductor-to-semimetal
transition, forming Dirac cone and generating divergent SHG spectra as photon
energy goes to zero. Additionally, the chemical potential allows for precise
control over interband and intraband nonlinear responses. This work provides
important theoretical foundations for the development of BP-based tunable
nonlinear photonic devices and expands the application potential of anisotropic
two-dimensional materials in nonlinear optics.

</details>


### [434] [Amplification and Detection of Single Itinerant Microwave Photons](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08030)
*Lukas Danner,Max Hofheinz,Nicolas Bourlet,Ciprian Padurariu,Joachim Ankerhold,Björn Kubala*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 由于微波光子能量低，检测单个微波光子很困难。本研究提出了一种基于约瑟夫森光子器件的单光子倍增、放大和检测协议，以解决低能量问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现代量子光学和量子技术需要检测单个微波光子，但其低能量使得检测极具挑战性。

Method: 研究并模拟了一个详细的协议，该协议利用约瑟夫森光子器件中的非弹性库珀对隧穿和入射光子能量来产生多个光子。结合了 Mølmer 最近开发的描述光子脉冲完整量子态的理论和随机薛定谔方程，对倍增和检测协议进行了建模，并计算了检测概率和暗计数率等性能参数。

Result: 所提出的协议在优化参数后，能够在输出模式中实现高单光子填充，这可以通过与传统线性放大器的外差测量来区分真空噪声。在具有两个倍增级（倍增因子为 16）的器件中，对于长度为 T 的高斯脉冲，检测概率可达 84.5%，暗计数率为 10^-3/T，有望超越现有方案。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于约瑟夫森光子器件的单光子倍增、放大和检测协议能够有效解决单个微波光子检测的低能量问题，并有望在量子技术中实现高性能的单光子计数。

Abstract: Single-photon detectors are an essential part of the toolbox of modern
quantum optics for implementing quantum technologies and enabling tests of
fundamental physics. The low energy of microwave photons, the natural signal
path for superconducting quantum devices, makes their detection much harder
than for visible light. Despite impressive progress in recent years and the
proposal and realization of a number of different detector architectures, the
reliable detection of a single itinerant microwave photon remains an open
topic.
  Here, we investigate and simulate a detailed protocol for single-photon
multiplication and subsequent amplification and detection. At its heart lies a
Josephson-photonics device which uses inelastic Cooper-pair tunneling driven by
a dc bias in combination with the energy of an incoming photon to create
multiple photons, thus compensating for the low-energy problem. Our analysis
provides clear design guidelines for utilizing such devices, which have
previously been operated in an amplifier mode with a continuous wave input, for
counting photons. Combining a formalism recently developed by M{\o}lmer to
describe the full quantum state of in- and outgoing photon pulses with
stochastic Schr\"odinger equations, we can describe the full multiplication and
detection protocol and calculate performance parameters, such as detection
probabilities and dark count rates. With optimized parameters, a high
population of a single output mode can be achieved that can then be easily
distinguished from vacuum noise in heterodyne measurements of quadratures with
a conventional linear amplifier. Realistic devices with two multiplication
stages with multiplication of $16$ reach for an impinging Gaussian pulse of
length $T$ a detection probability of $84.5\%$ with a dark count rate of
$10^{-3}/T$, and promise to outperform competing schemes.

</details>


### [435] [Far-field radiation of bulk, edge and corner eigenmodes from a finite 2D Su-Schrieffer-Heeger plasmonic lattice](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08063)
*Álvaro Buendía,José Luis Pura,Vincenzo Giannini,José Antonio Sánchez Gil*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 通过耦合电磁偶极子形式主义，我们开发了一种本征模式分析方法，以分离有限二维SSH阵列中每个模式对远场辐射的贡献。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 控制亚波长等离激元纳米粒子阵列在纳米尺度上对光行为的控制。

Method: 利用耦合电偶极子形式主义进行本征模式分析，并计算了有限二维SSH等离激元纳米粒子阵列中体、边缘和角等离面本征模式对远场辐射的贡献。

Result: 证明了反对称模式比对称模式更暗，且品质因数更高。此外，偶极子共振的离面性质导致所有体$mf	au$模式都是暗模式，而边缘和角态需要额外的面内对称性来抵消远场辐射，并且随着阵列尺寸的增加，辐射模式变得更加复杂并沿着阵列平面集中。

Conclusion: 通过利用多方单位元胞中对称性的破坏来定制光学特性和共振模式的远场辐射，揭示了不同模式（体、边缘、角）在远场辐射中的作用以及阵列尺寸对其影响。

Abstract: Subwavelength arrays of plasmonic nanoparticles allow us to control the
behaviour of light at the nanoscale. Here, we develop an eigenmode analysis,
employing a coupled electromagnetic dipole formalism, which permits us to
isolate the contribution to the far-field radiation of each array mode.
Specifically, we calculate the far-field radiation patterns by bulk, edge and
corner out-of-plane eigenmodes in a finite 2D Su-Schrieffer-Heeger (SSH) array
of plasmonic nanoparticles with out-of-plane dipolar resonances. The breaking
of symmetries in multipartite unit cells is exploited to tailor the optical
properties and far-field radiation of the resonant modes. We prove that the
antisymmetric modes are darker and have higher Q-factors than their symmetric
counterparts. Also, the out-of-plane nature of the dipolar resonances imposes
that all bulk $\Gamma$-modes are dark, while corner and edge states need extra
in-plane symmetries to cancel the far-field radiation; radiation patterns in
turn become more complex and concentrated along the array plane with increasing
array size.

</details>


### [436] [Surface-Localized Magnetic Order in RuO2 Thin Films Revealed by Low-Energy Muon Probes](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08064)
*Akashdeep Akashdeep,Sachin Krishnia,Jae-Hyun Ha,Siyeon An,Maik Gaerner,Thomas Prokscha,Andreas Suter,Gianluca Janka,Günter Reiss,Timo Kuschel,Dong-Soo Han,Angelo Di Bernardo,Zaher Salman,Gerhard Jakob,Mathias Kläui*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 钌（RuO2）薄膜在表面附近存在不均匀的静态磁有序。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 阐明RuO2薄膜（尤其是在不同生长条件下制备的）的内在磁基态，以解决其是否为反磁性的争论。

Method: 利用具有深度分辨灵敏度的低能μ子自旋旋转/弛豫（LE-muSR）技术，在4 K至290 K的温度范围内，对不同基底上制备的RuO2薄膜（厚度为30 nm和33 nm）进行横向磁场（TF）下的测量。

Result: LE-muSR数据表明，磁信号来源于薄膜近表面区域（<10 nm），并且受影响的体积分数最高约为8.5%。这种局域化的磁响应在不同的基底、生长技术和参数下均保持一致，表明其起源与表面缺陷和维度效应有关。

Conclusion: 该研究通过结合TF-muSR和低能μ子深度依赖注入技术，为RuO2薄膜表面局域化的不均匀静态磁有序提供了直接证据，有助于调和现有研究中的矛盾。研究结果强调了考虑低维贡献的重要性，并鼓励进一步探索缺陷、应变和化学计量比对RuO2磁性质（尤其是在表面）的影响。

Abstract: Ruthenium dioxide (RuO2) has recently emerged as a candidate altermagnet, yet
its intrinsic magnetic ground state, particularly in thin films, remains
debated. This study aims to clarify the nature and spatial extent of the
magnetic order in RuO2 thin films grown under different conditions. Thin films
of RuO2 with thicknesses of 30 nm and 33 nm are fabricated by pulsed laser
deposition and sputtering onto TiO2(110) and Al2O3(1-102) substrates,
respectively. Low-energy muon spin rotation/relaxation (LE-muSR) with
depth-resolved sensitivity measurements is performed in transverse magnetic
fields (TF) from 4 K to 290 K. The muSR data collected with a muon implantation
energy of 1 keV reveal that magnetic signals originate from the near-surface
region of the film (<10 nm), and the affected volume fraction is at most about
8.5%. The localized magnetic response is consistent across different
substrates, growth techniques, and parameter sets, suggesting a common origin
related to surface defects and dimensionality effects. The combined use of
TF-muSR and the study of depth-dependent implantation with low-energy muons
provides direct evidence for surface-confined, inhomogeneous static magnetic
order in RuO2 thin films, helping reconcile discrepancies. These findings
underscore the importance of considering reduced-dimensional contributions and
motivate further investigation into the role of defects, strain, and
stoichiometry on the magnetic properties of RuO2, especially at the surface.

</details>


### [437] [Topological surface magnon-polariton in an insulating canted antiferromagnet](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08334)
*Weixin Li,Rundong Yuan,Fenglin Zhong,Bo Peng,Jean-Philippe Ansermet,Haiming Yu*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 本文提出了拓扑表面磁振极化激子，一种可以激发赤铁矿中反铁磁磁振子的潜在方法。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 激发和控制反铁磁磁振子模式是相干反铁磁自旋电子学 の核心。

Method: 在绝缘的倾斜反铁磁体中，磁振子可以与光子强耦合，存在一个表面磁振极化激子模式，其出现在体磁振子-光子带隙中。该模式的出现归因于体磁振子-光子带的非平凡拓扑结构。

Result: 磁振子-光子耦合增强了交叉点附近的贝里曲率，形成与表面磁振极化激子相关的拓扑陈带。

Conclusion: 本文提供了一个利用反铁磁体光学性质的通用原理，并以赤铁矿为例进行了说明。

Abstract: Excitation and control of antiferromagnetic magnon modes lie at the heart of
coherent antiferromagnetic spintronics. Here, we propose a topological surface
magnon-polariton as the potential means to excite antiferromagnetic magnons in
the prototypical magnonic material hematite. We show that in an insulating
canted antiferromagnet, where the magnons can strongly couple to photons using
electrical on-chip layouts, a surface magnon-polariton mode exists in the gap
of the bulk magnon-photon bands. The emergence of surface magnon-polariton mode
is further attributed to the nontrivial topology of bulk magnon-photon bands.
Magnon-photon coupling enhances the Berry curvature near the anticrossing
points, leading to a topological bulk Chern band associated with the surface
magnon-polaritons. Our work provides a general principle for the utilisation of
optomagnetic properties in antiferromagnets, with an illustration of its
feasibility in the particular case of hematite.

</details>


### [438] [Classical to Quantum Diffusive Transport in Atomically Thin Semiconductors Capped with High-k Dielectric](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.08557)
*Jaroslaw Pawlowski,Dickson Thian,Repaka Maheswar,Chai Jian Wei,Pawan Kumar,Sudhiranjan Tripathy,Hugh O. H. Churchill,Dharmraj Kotekar Patil*

Main category: cond-mat.mes-hall

TL;DR: 氧化铪（HfO2）可以增强二硫化钼（MoS2）的量子传输特性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究介电环境对原子尺度二维材料（如MoS2）的量子输运性质的影响，特别是低温下的量子输运。

Method: 通过比较有无HfO2 覆盖层的器件，并建立紧束缚干涉仪模型来模拟介电屏蔽效应。

Result: 未加盖HfO2 的器件表现出经典的扩散散射，而加盖HfO2 的器件则显示出清晰的法布里-珀罗干涉图样，证明了相干量子输运。

Conclusion: 介电工程是调控过渡金属硫族化合物（TMD）器件输运特性的有效方法。

Abstract: The dielectric environment surrounding semiconductors plays a crucial role in
determining device performance, a role that becomes especially pronounced in
atomically thin semiconductors where charge carriers are confined within a few
atomic layers and strongly interact with their surroundings. High-k
dielectrics, such as hafnium oxide (HfO2), have been shown to enhance the
performance of two-dimensional (2D) materials by suppressing scattering from
charged impurities and phonons, but most studies to date have focused on
room-temperature transistor operation. Their influence on quantum transport
properties at low temperatures remains largely unexplored. In this work, we
investigate how capping monolayer molybdenum disulfide (MoS2) with HfO2
modifies its electronic behavior in the quantum regime. By comparing devices
with and without HfO2 capping, we find that uncapped devices exhibit transport
dominated by classical diffusive scattering, whereas capped devices show clear
Fabry-Perot interference patterns, providing direct evidence of phase-coherent
quantum transport enabled by dielectric screening. To gain further insight, we
develop a tight-binding interferometer model that captures the effect of
dielectric screening on conductive modes and reproduces the experimental
trends. Our findings demonstrate that dielectric engineering provides a
powerful route to control transport regimes in TMD devices.

</details>

# quant-ph [[Back]](#toc)

### [439] [What is Quantum Computer Security?](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07334)
*Sanjay Deshpande,Jakub Szefer*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 这篇论文介绍了量子计算机安全性的概念，即如何保护量子计算机免受安全攻击，并与后量子密码学（保护经典计算机免受量子计算机攻击）进行了对比。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 随着量子计算硬件的快速发展和云平台的普及，量子计算机的可用性大大提高。然而，量子计算并非免疫于安全威胁。虽然已有大量研究关注后量子密码学（如何保护经典计算机免受量子计算机的攻击），但对量子计算机本身的安全防护却关注较少。因此，本研究旨在提出并探讨量子计算机安全性的概念。

Method: 本文提出并探讨了“量子计算机安全性”的对偶概念，即如何保护量子计算机本身免受安全攻击。这与已有的后量子密码学（保护经典计算机免受量子计算机攻击）的研究方向形成对比。

Result: 本文提出了量子计算机安全性的概念，并指出了与后量子密码学（保护经典计算机免受量子计算机攻击）的区别和联系。

Conclusion: 量子计算虽然前景广阔，但也面临安全挑战。除了研究如何用量子密码学保护经典计算机外，保护量子计算机本身的安全也日益重要。本文提出的“量子计算机安全性”概念为此类研究提供了新的视角。

Abstract: Quantum computing is rapidly emerging as one of the most transformative
technologies of our time. With the potential to tackle problems that remain
intractable for even the most powerful classical supercomputers, quantum
hardware has advanced at an extraordinary pace. Today, major platforms such as
IBM Quantum, Amazon Braket, and Microsoft Azure provide cloud-based access to
quantum processors, making them more widely available than ever before. While a
promising technology, quantum computing is not magically immune to security
threats. Much research has been done on post-quantum cryptography, which
addresses how to protect classical computers from attackers using quantum
computers. This article meanwhile introduces the dual idea of quantum computer
security: how to protect quantum computers from security attacks.

</details>


### [440] [A Hardware-Efficient Mølmer-Sørensen Gate for Superconducting Quantum Computers](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07352)
*M. AbuGhanem*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 在IBM的超导量子处理器上实现了高效的Mølmer-Sørensen门，保真度达到92.47%，与本地CX门相当。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 验证Mølmer-Sørensen门在超导量子硬件上的性能，并提供一种高效的实现方式。

Method: 在IBM量子处理器的超导硬件上实现了Mølmer-Sørensen门，并使用量子过程断层扫描（QPT）对其进行了性能表征。

Result: 实现了92.47%的保真度，与本地CX门的93.02%相当。对于|00⟩输入态，制备的目标贝尔态的成功概率为94.2%。

Conclusion: 非本地纠缠门可以优化到与硬件本地操作相媲美的性能。这项工作扩展了固定架构处理器上的算法设计门集，并为跨平台门评估提供了关键基准。

Abstract: The M{\o}lmer-S{\o}rensen gate, a cornerstone entangling operation in
trapped-ion systems, represents a promising alternative to standard entangling
gates in superconducting quantum architectures. However, its performance on
superconducting hardware has remained unverified. In this work, we present a
hardware-efficient implementation of the M{\o}lmer-S{\o}rensen gate and
characterize its performance using quantum process tomography (QPT) on IBM
Quantum's superconducting processors. Our implementation achieves a process
fidelity of 92.47\% on the real quantum hardware, a performance competitive
with the 93.02\% fidelity of the device's native controlled-NOT (CX) gate.
Furthermore, for the $|00\rangle$ input state, the gate prepares the target
Bell state with $94.2\%$ success probability, confirming its correct logical
operation. These results demonstrate that non-native entangling gates can be
optimized to perform on par with hardware-native operations. This work expands
the effective gate set for algorithm design on fixed-architecture processors
and provides a critical benchmark for cross-platform gate evaluation,
underscoring the role of hardware-aware compilation in advancing noisy
intermediate-scale quantum (NISQ) computing.

</details>


### [441] [Quantum Algorithm for Binary Vector Encoding and Retrieval Utilizing the Permutation Trick](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07354)
*Andreas Wichert*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 我们提出了一种新的量子存储算法，将 k 个维度为 m 的二元向量存储到基于置换技术 的 m 量子比特叠加态中。我们将此算法与 Ventura 和 Martinez 提出的存储算法进行了比较。置换技术更简单，并且可以通过约简算法进行额外的约简。为了从由 m 量子比特量子态表示的 k 个向量的叠加态中检索二元向量，我们必须使用 Grover 算法的修改版本，因为 Grover 算法对于非均匀分布无法正常工作。我们介绍了置换技巧，该技巧使 Grover 算法能够在 k 个模式下进行穷举搜索，步数为 k 的平方根，与 n 等于 2 的 m 次幂无关。我们将此技巧与 Ventura 和 Martinez 的技巧进行了比较，后者需要 n 的平方根步数来处理 k 个模式。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本研究提出了一种新的量子存储算法，用于将多个二元向量编码到量子态中，并与现有算法进行比较。

Method: 提出了一种基于置换技术的新型量子存储算法，并对 Grover 算法进行了修改以适应非均匀分布，从而实现了更快的检索速度。

Result: 与 Ventura 和 Martinez 的算法相比，该置换技术更简单，并且能够通过约简算法实现额外的约简。修改后的 Grover 算法可以在 k 步内检索 k 个模式，而 Ventura 和 Martinez 的算法需要 n 步。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于置换技术的新型量子存储算法，结合修改后的 Grover 算法，在存储和检索二元向量方面比现有方法更有效率。

Abstract: We present a novel quantum storage algorithm for k binary vectors of
dimension m into a superposition of a m qubit quantum state based on a
permutation technique. We compare this algorithm to the storage algorithm
proposed by Ventura and Martinez. The permutation technique is simpler and can
lead to an additional reduction through the reduce algorithm. To retrieve a
binary vector from the superposition of k vectors represented by a m qubit
quantum state, we must use a modified version of Grover algorithm, as Grover
algorithm does not function correctly for non uniform distributions. We
introduce the permutation trick that enables an exhaustive search by Grover
algorithm in square root of k steps for k patterns, independent of n equal two
power m. We compare this trick to the Ventura and Martinez trick, which
requires square root of n steps for k patterns.

</details>


### [442] [Quantum Filtering and Analysis of Multiplicities in Eigenvalue Spectra](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07439)
*Zhiyan Ding,Lin Lin,Yilun Yang,Ruizhe Zhang*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种名为QFAMES的量子算法，用于高效地识别和分析量子哈密顿量的特征值谱，特别是在存在紧密间隔的主导特征值和简并特征值的情况下，从而克服了最坏情况下的计算复杂性障碍，并能估计特定能量簇中的可观测量期望值。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 提取量子哈密顿量的精细光谱属性（特征值及其重数）对于表征多体量子系统和理解拓扑序等现象至关重要，但这些属性的提取在最坏情况下是#BQP-完全的。

Method: QFAMES算法能够高效地识别紧密间隔的主导特征值簇，并确定它们的重数。它通过在物理上合理的假设下工作，绕过了最坏情况下的复杂性障碍。此外，QFAMES还能估计目标能量簇中的可观测量期望值。

Result: QFAMES算法通过数值演示被验证了其有效性，包括在横向场伊辛模型中表征量子相以及在二维 تورic码模型中估计拓扑有序相的基态简并度。

Conclusion: QFAMES算法在理论上具有严格的保证，并且在样本复杂性和区分简并能力方面比现有的基于子空间的方法具有显著优势，为量子光谱分析提供了一个强大的新工具。

Abstract: Fine-grained spectral properties of quantum Hamiltonians, including both
eigenvalues and their multiplicities, provide useful information for
characterizing many-body quantum systems as well as for understanding phenomena
such as topological order. Extracting such information with small additive
error is $\#\textsf{BQP}$-complete in the worst case. In this work, we
introduce QFAMES (Quantum Filtering and Analysis of Multiplicities in
Eigenvalue Spectra), a quantum algorithm that efficiently identifies clusters
of closely spaced dominant eigenvalues and determines their multiplicities
under physically motivated assumptions, which allows us to bypass worst-case
complexity barriers. QFAMES also enables the estimation of observable
expectation values within targeted energy clusters, providing a powerful tool
for studying quantum phase transitions and other physical properties. We
validate the effectiveness of QFAMES through numerical demonstrations,
including its applications to characterizing quantum phases in the
transverse-field Ising model and estimating the ground-state degeneracy of a
topologically ordered phase in the two-dimensional toric code model. Our
approach offers rigorous theoretical guarantees and significant advantages over
existing subspace-based quantum spectral analysis methods, particularly in
terms of the sample complexity and the ability to resolve degeneracies.

</details>


### [443] [Proposals for experimentally realizing (mostly) quantum-autonomous gates](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07372)
*José Antonio Marín Guzmán,Yu-Xin Wang,Tom Manovitz,Paul Erker,Norbert M. Linke,Simone Gasparinetti,Nicole Yunger Halpern*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 生成一篇关于量子计算的论文摘要，重点介绍量子自主门的设计和实现。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 量子计算领域对减少经典控制的需求日益增长，以克服相干时间和几何形状的限制。

Method: 提出在里德堡原子、离子阱和超导量子比特三种平台上实现（全或部分）量子自主门。具体方法包括利用里德堡阻塞相互作用、超快跃迁、线性保罗陷阱、环形陷阱以及电路量子电动力学。

Result: 在里德堡原子平台上，利用里德堡阻塞相互作用或超快跃迁实现量子自主的单比特和两比特门。在离子阱平台上，通过塑形线性保罗陷阱或利用环形陷阱，实现大部分量子自主的Z门或两比特门。在超导量子比特平台上，利用电路量子电动力学实现量子自主的Z门和XY门。

Conclusion: 所提出的量子自主门可以在不同平台上实现，并可作为构建（全或部分）量子自主电路的基础模块，有望减轻经典控制的负担，推动量子计算的发展。

Abstract: Autonomous quantum machines (AQMs) execute tasks without requiring
time-dependent external control. Motivations for AQMs include the restrictions
imposed by classical control on quantum machines' coherence times and
geometries. Most AQM work is theoretical and abstract; yet an experiment
recently demonstrated AQMs' usefulness in qubit reset, crucial to quantum
computing. To further reduce quantum computing's classical control, we propose
realizations of (fully and partially) quantum-autonomous gates on three
platforms: Rydberg atoms, trapped ions, and superconducting qubits. First, we
show that a Rydberg-blockade interaction or an ultrafast transition can
quantum-autonomously effect entangling gates on Rydberg atoms. One can perform
$Z$ or entangling gates on trapped ions mostly quantum-autonomously, by
sculpting a linear Paul trap or leveraging a ring trap. Passive lasers control
these gates, as well as the Rydberg-atom gates, quantum-autonomously. Finally,
circuit quantum electrodynamics can enable quantum-autonomous $Z$ and $XY$
gates on superconducting qubits. The gates can serve as building blocks for
(fully or partially) quantum-autonomous circuits, which may reduce
classical-control burdens.

</details>


### [444] [3-Local Hamiltonian Problem and Constant Relative Error Quantum Partition Function Approximation: $O(2^{\frac{n}{2}})$ Algorithm Is Nearly Optimal under QSETH](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07495)
*Nai-Hui Chia,Yu-Ching Shen*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 该论文建立了局部哈密顿量（LH）问题和量子配分函数（QPF）近似问题的条件下界，证明了现有算法接近最优，并为固定局部性的LH和QPF问题提供了首个细粒度下界。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 证明局部哈密顿量（LH）问题和量子配分函数（QPF）近似问题的现有算法接近最优，并探索是否存在更快的量子算法。

Method: 在量子强指数时间假设（QSETH）下，通过证明3-局部LH问题无法在$O(2^{\frac{n}{2}(1-\varepsilon)})$时间内解决，以及3-局部QPF问题无法在$O(2^{\frac{n}{2}(1-\varepsilon)})$时间内近似到任意常数相对误差，来建立条件性下界。此外，论文还提出了一个能在$O^*(2^{n/2})$时间内近似QPF的量子算法。

Result: 1) 证明了在QSETH下，3-局部LH问题无法在$O(2^{\frac{n}{2}(1-\varepsilon)})$时间内解决。 2) 证明了在QSETH下，3-局部QPF问题无法在$O(2^{\frac{n}{2}(1-\varepsilon)})$时间内近似到任意常数相对误差。 3) 提出了一个量子算法，能在$O^*(2^{n/2})$时间内将QPF近似到相对误差$1/2 + 1/\mathrm{poly}(n)$。

Conclusion: 该论文成功建立了LH和QPF问题的条件性下界，表明现有算法在接近最优，并为固定局部性的LH和QPF问题提供了首个细粒度下界，这对量子复杂性理论和量子多体物理学具有重要意义。

Abstract: We investigate the computational complexity of the Local Hamiltonian (LH)
problem and the approximation of the Quantum Partition Function (QPF), two
central problems in quantum many-body physics and quantum complexity theory.
Both problems are known to be QMA-hard, and under the widely believed
assumption that $\mathsf{BQP} \neq \mathsf{QMA}$, no efficient quantum
algorithm exits. The best known quantum algorithm for LH runs in
$O\bigl(2^{\frac{n}{2}(1 - o(1))}\bigr)$ time, while for QPF, the
state-of-the-art algorithm achieves relative error $\delta$ in
$O^\ast\bigl(\frac{1}{\delta}\sqrt{\frac{2^n}{Z}}\bigr)$ time, where $Z$
denotes the value of the partition function. A nature open question is whether
more efficient algorithms exist for both problems.
  In this work, we establish tight conditional lower bounds showing that these
algorithms are nearly optimal. Under the plausible Quantum Strong Exponential
Time Hypothesis (QSETH), we prove that no quantum algorithm can solve either LH
or approximate QPF significantly faster than $O(2^{n/2})$, even for 3-local
Hamiltonians. In particular, we show: 1) 3-local LH cannot be solved in time
$O(2^{\frac{n}{2}(1-\varepsilon)})$ for any $\varepsilon > 0$ under QSETH; 2)
3-local QPF cannot be approximated up to any constant relative error in
$O(2^{\frac{n}{2}(1-\varepsilon)})$ time for any $\varepsilon > 0$ under QSETH;
and 3) we present a quantum algorithm that approximates QPF up to relative
error $1/2 + 1/\mathrm{poly}(n)$ in $O^\ast(2^{n/2})$ time, matching our
conditional lower bound.
  Notably, our results provide the first fine-grained lower bounds for both LH
and QPF with fixed locality. This stands in sharp contrast to QSETH and the
trivial fine-grained lower bounds for LH, where the locality of the SAT
instance and the Hamiltonian depends on the parameter $\varepsilon$ in the
$O(2^{\frac{n}{2}(1-\varepsilon)})$ running time.

</details>


### [445] [Quantum simulation of chemistry via quantum fast multipole method](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07380)
*Dominic W. Berry,Kianna Wan,Andrew D. Baczewski,Elliot C. Eklund,Arkin Tikku,Ryan Babbush*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种在量子计算机上模拟量子化学的新方法，其渐近复杂度显著低于现有技术，对于小于 eta^6 的情况具有更优性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了在量子计算机上实现比现有方法具有更低渐近复杂度的量子化学模拟。

Method: 使用实空间一阶量化分子哈密顿量表示，并结合高阶乘积公式进行传播。通过类似快速多极方法的技术，以 O(η) 复杂度计算库仑算符，并将其修改以适应量子计算机实现。

Result: 提出了一种门复杂度为 t(η^(4/3)N^(1/3) + η^(1/3)N^(2/3))(ηNt/ε)^(o(1)) 的方法，其中 N 是网格点数，ε 是目标精度，t 是时间演化持续时间。与先前算法相比，提供了约 O(η) 的加速，并且在 N<η^6 的实际应用场景下复杂度更低。

Conclusion: 该方法在量子计算机上实现了量子化学模拟的显著加速，尤其是在实际应用所需的参数范围内。然而，为了充分发挥其优势，需要较大的粒子数 (η ≳ 10^3)。

Abstract: Here we describe an approach for simulating quantum chemistry on quantum
computers with significantly lower asymptotic complexity than prior work. The
approach uses a real-space first-quantised representation of the molecular
Hamiltonian which we propagate using high-order product formulae. Essential for
this low complexity is the use of a technique similar to the fast multipole
method for computing the Coulomb operator with $\widetilde{\cal O}(\eta)$
complexity for a simulation with $\eta$ particles. We show how to modify this
algorithm so that it can be implemented on a quantum computer. We ultimately
demonstrate an approach with $t(\eta^{4/3}N^{1/3} + \eta^{1/3} N^{2/3} ) (\eta
Nt/\epsilon)^{o(1)}$ gate complexity, where $N$ is the number of grid points,
$\epsilon$ is target precision, and $t$ is the duration of time evolution. This
is roughly a speedup by ${\cal O}(\eta)$ over most prior algorithms. We provide
lower complexity than all prior work for $N<\eta^6$ (the regime of practical
interest), with only first-quantised interaction-picture simulations providing
better performance for $N>\eta^6$. As with the classical fast multipole method,
large numbers $\eta\gtrsim 10^3$ would be needed to realise this advantage.

</details>


### [446] [No exponential quantum speedup for $\mathrm{SIS}^\infty$ anymore](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07515)
*Robin Kothari,Ryan O'Donnell,Kewen Wu*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 提出了针对SIS和CISS问题的经典算法，证明了不存在指数级量子加速。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在2021年，Chen、Liu和Zhandry提出了一种针对平均情况下的L_infty-SIS问题的有效量子算法，该算法的参数范围不在通常的密码学关注范围内，但仍然没有已知的有效经典算法。这尤其令人兴奋，因为L_infty-SIS问题是一个没有结构的简单问题，并且他们的算法技术与先前指数级量子加速所使用的技术不同。

Method: 提出了针对SIS和CISS问题的经典算法。

Result: 证明了不存在指数级量子加速。

Conclusion: SIS和CISS问题不存在指数级量子加速。

Abstract: In 2021, Chen, Liu, and Zhandry presented an efficient quantum algorithm for
the average-case $\ell_\infty$-Short Integer Solution ($\mathrm{SIS}^\infty$)
problem, in a parameter range outside the normal range of cryptographic
interest, but still with no known efficient classical algorithm. This was
particularly exciting since $\mathrm{SIS}^\infty$ is a simple problem without
structure, and their algorithmic techniques were different from those used in
prior exponential quantum speedups.
  We present efficient classical algorithms for all of the
$\mathrm{SIS}^\infty$ and (more general) Constrained Integer Solution problems
studied in their paper, showing there is no exponential quantum speedup
anymore.

</details>


### [447] [Quantum Resources in Non-Abelian Lattice Gauge Theories: Nonstabilizerness, Multipartite Entanglement, and Fermionic Non-Gaussianity](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07385)
*Gopal Chandra Santra,Julius Mildenberger,Edoardo Ballini,Alberto Bottarelli,Matteo M. Wauters,Philipp Hauke*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 非阿贝尔规范理论不一定比阿贝尔规范理论更难模拟，所需的量子资源取决于多种因素的相互作用。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 文章旨在比较模拟阿贝尔和非阿贝尔规范理论所需的量子资源，以了解非阿贝尔理论是否更具挑战性。

Method: 文章比较了三种衡量量子资源的范式：稳定器 Rényi 熵、广义几何纠缠度以及费米子反平坦度，用于研究具有阿贝尔 $\mathbb{Z}_N$ 和非阿贝尔 $D_3$ 及 SU(2) 规范对称性的纯规范理论。

Result: 研究发现，非阿贝尔对称性并不一定比阿贝尔对称性更难模拟。所需的量子资源取决于 the interplay between the group structure, superselection sector, and encoding of the gauge constraints。

Conclusion: 研究结果有助于确定在量子模拟格点规范理论（包括 NISQ 和容错时代）中可能出现量子优势的领域。

Abstract: Lattice gauge theories (LGTs) represent one of the most ambitious goals of
quantum simulation. From a practical implementation perspective, non-Abelian
theories present significantly tougher challenges than Abelian LGTs. However,
it is unknown whether this is also reflected in increased values of quantum
resources relating to the complexity of simulating quantum many-body models.
Here, we compare three paradigmatic measures of quantum resources -- stabilizer
R\'enyi entropy, generalized geometric measure of entanglement, and fermionic
antiflatness -- for pure-gauge theories on a ladder with Abelian $\mathbb{Z}_N$
as well as non-Abelian $D_3$ and SU(2) gauge symmetries. We find that
non-Abelian symmetries are not necessarily inherently harder to simulate than
Abelian ones, but rather the required quantum resources depend nontrivially on
the interplay between the group structure, superselection sector, and encoding
of the gauge constraints. Our findings help indicate where quantum advantage
could emerge in simulations of LGTs, both in NISQ and fault-tolerant eras.

</details>


### [448] [Conjugate queries can help](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07622)
*Ewin Tang,John Wright,Mark Zhandry*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 量子算法在处理共轭和转置查询时比仅使用前向和反向查询更强大，这表明在证明安全性时应考虑这些查询。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Zhandry 提出应证明加密原语的安全性，以抵御共轭和转置查询，本文旨在探索这些查询的实际影响。

Method: 通过分析量子算法在处理前向、反向、共轭和转置查询时的查询次数和能力，提出“橡子技巧”来绕过确定性算法的不可行性定理。

Result: 发现共轭和转置查询确实能增强量子算法的能力，并提出一种量子承诺方案，该方案在仅使用前向和反向查询的对手面前是安全的，但在允许共轭查询的对手面前则不安全。为决策任务设计的算法，在使用（前向和反向）状态制备查询时，其能力仅比样本访问能力好二次方。

Conclusion: 共轭和转置查询确实能增强量子算法的能力，并且在设计加密原语时应考虑这些查询。提出的“橡子技巧”提供了一种在允许输出随机性的情况下增强量子资源的方法。

Abstract: We give a natural problem over input quantum oracles $U$ which cannot be
solved with exponentially many black-box queries to $U$ and $U^\dagger$, but
which can be solved with constant many queries to $U$ and $U^*$, or $U$ and
$U^{\mathrm{T}}$. We also demonstrate a quantum commitment scheme that is
secure against adversaries that query only $U$ and $U^\dagger$, but is insecure
if the adversary can query $U^*$. These results show that conjugate and
transpose queries do give more power to quantum algorithms, lending credence to
the idea put forth by Zhandry that cryptographic primitives should prove
security against these forms of queries.
  Our key lemma is that any circuit using $q$ forward and inverse queries to a
state preparation unitary for a state $\sigma$ can be simulated to
$\varepsilon$ error with $n = \mathcal{O}(q^2/\varepsilon)$ copies of $\sigma$.
Consequently, for decision tasks, algorithms using (forward and inverse) state
preparation queries only ever perform quadratically better than sample access.
These results follow from straightforward combinations of existing techniques;
our contribution is to state their consequences in their strongest, most
counter-intuitive form. In doing so, we identify a motif where generically
strengthening a quantum resource can be possible if the output is allowed to be
random, bypassing no-go theorems for deterministic algorithms. We call this the
acorn trick.

</details>


### [449] [Spectral properties and coding transitions of Haar-random quantum codes](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07396)
*Grace M. Sommers,J. Alexander Jacoby,Zack Weinstein,David A. Huse,Sarang Gopalakrishnan*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: Haar-random quantum codes exhibit a mixed-state phase transition at their error threshold, characterized by the merging of error bands in the encoded system density matrix spectrum. The threshold saturates the hashing bound, matching random stabilizer codes. Postselected error correction is possible beyond this bound.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: This paper explores the mixed-state phase transition in Haar-random quantum codes when the error rate reaches the nonzero error threshold.
